    Tests to verify the scenerio mode funtions correctly.

      void testGameEndsLoss()
      This test checks whether the game ends when the player has lost all their reputation points in the scenario mode.
      void testGameEndsWin()
      This test checks whether the game ends when the player has fed all the customers in the scenario mode.
      void testWaveSetupWith100Customers()
      This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is 100.

      This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is 10.

      void testWaveSetupWithMoreThan10Customers()
      This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is more than 10.

    • Method Detail

      • InstantiateCustomerScripts

        void InstantiateCustomerScripts​(com.mygdx.game.Core.GameState.Difficulty difficulty,
                                int noCustomers,
                                int frustration)
        Instantiates the customer scripts so customers can be used for tests. Satisfies requirements for UR_SCENARIO_MODE, UR_SCENARIO_END, UR_DIFFICULTY
        Parameters:
        difficulty - The difficulty of the game.
        noCustomers - The number of customers in the game.
        frustration - The time that it takes for the customer to become frustrated.

      • testWaveSetupWithMoreThan10Customers

        public void testWaveSetupWithMoreThan10Customers()
        This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is more than 10.

      • testWaveSetupWithLessThan10Customers

        public void testWaveSetupWithLessThan10Customers()
        This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is 5.

      • testWaveSetupWith10Customers

        public void testWaveSetupWith10Customers()
        This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is 10.

      • testWaveSetupWith6Customers

        public void testWaveSetupWith6Customers()
        This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is 6. This is a special case as it is the smallest number of customers that will cause a wave of each size to be created.

      • testWaveSetupWith100Customers

        public void testWaveSetupWith100Customers()
        This test checks whether the customer controller is correctly setting up the waves of customers for the scenario mode when the number of customers is 100. This is the maximum number of customers allowed for the scenario mode.

      • EndGame

        void EndGame​(com.mygdx.game.Core.ValueStructures.EndOfGameValues val)

      • testGameEndsWin

        public void testGameEndsWin()
        This test checks whether the game ends when the player has fed all the customers in the scenario mode.

      • testGameEndsLoss

        public void testGameEndsLoss()
        This test checks whether the game ends when the player has lost all their reputation points in the scenario mode.
